name: 测试笔记选择3
text: 我为什么不相信骑士团

name: zhm测试选择1
text: 这是第一个问题，请回答：

name: 参与十字路口要塞攻城战前-选择1
editor_name: QV3-P3-参与十字路口要塞攻城战前-选择1
text:
In any case, we must rely on the Union for the time being. It's a matter of the town's survival. 
It's not perfect, but it is realistic.

name: 十字路口会战后的反思（无信物）-选择1
editor_name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（无信物）-选择1
text: Regardless, I must act more flexibly and cautiously from now on. After such a heavy setback at the Crossroads Battle, the Sword of Convallaria can't withstand another loss.

name: 十字路口会战后的反思（歌洛莉亚信物）-选择1
editor_name: QV3-P4-十字路口会战后的反思（歌洛莉亚信物）-选择1
text: Regardless, I must act more flexibly and cautiously from now on. After such a heavy setback at the Crossroads Battle, the Sword of Convallaria can't withstand another loss.

name: 关于二王子的计划-选择1
editor_name: QV3-P4-关于二王子的计划-选择1
text: I have a feeling that the moment of decision will come soon…

name: 二王子的来信
text: Should I trust Lutfi and his plan?

name: 和谈失败后的笔记-抉择1
editor_name: 和谈失败后的笔记-抉择1
text: To no one's surprise, Inanna rejected the "tyrannical" peace treaty proposed by the Papal States.
